main event: The document contains multiple UFO sightings reported to the U.S. Air Force, including sightings by Capt. and Mrs. Fortney, Lt. Ponances, Major Gardiniar, Mrs. Gardinier, Mrs. Lowell Allen, and an unnamed witness.
interesting points: The sightings describe unusual objects such as a bluish-white light, a fiery trail, and a bright white light approaching the field from the North.
Some witnesses observed the objects changing in size and emitting sparks in various colors.
The descriptions include the observation of a pancake-shaped object, 20 to 30 feet across and 5-10 feet thick, capable of hovering and motionless in the air.
The document also includes a directive for reporting future sightings of potential intelligence value in accordance with AFR 200-2.
The document is marked as 'UNCLASSIFIED' and includes information about downgrading and declassification of reports after certain time intervals.
sighted object: various unusual objects, including bluish-white light, bright white light, and pancake-shaped object
location: Fairchild AFB, Washington, Spokane, and surrounding areas
witnesses: Military personnel, Capt. and Mrs. Fortney, Lt. Ponances, Major Gardiniar, Mrs. Gardinier, Mrs. Lowell Allen, and an unnamed witness
